column1: # distrib-weight: units to tailor the distribution of roid types (ex. simply a 2 is worth 2x 1's).
# ceil: ceiling above/below plane (in meters) for placement.
# child-id: <id> of child asteroids to spawn when destroyed.
# min-childs: min number of child asteroids to spawn when destroyed.
# max-childs: max number of child asteroids to spawn when destroyed.
